/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/cc  -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/splitview.dir/splitview.c.o CMakeFiles/splitview.dir/__/deps/glad_gl.c.o  -o splitview.app/Contents/MacOS/splitview -Wl,-rpath,/Users/liuqian8/Desktop/glfw-3.3/src ../src/libglfw.3.3.dylib
